commands.name: search-by-artist
commands.title: Search Artist Setlists
commands.subtitle: setlist.fm
commands.description: Enter an artist and find setlists from their concerts.

tools.name: search-artist
tools.title: Search Artist
tools.description: Search for an Artist on setlist.fm

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: setlist.fm API Key
preferences.description: Enter your setlist.fm API key. You can get one at https://www.setlist.fm/settings/apps.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
